text: Cheryl Chase (born Cheryl Christine Hudock, December 25, 1958) is an American actress. She is best known for voicing Angelica Pickles on the animated series Rugrats and its subsequent spinoffs and for voicing Little Miss Bossy and Little Miss Curious on The Mr. Men Show, while being credited as "Sophie Roberts". Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:American voice actors
title: Cheryl Chase (actress)
